channel.title: Wanting players to join my server. Everyone is admin (ham)
channel.description:
Hey everyone all you need is Hamachi and RichScape Client v3
Hamachi--> en.utilidades-utiles.com/download-hamachi.html RichScape Client v3--> http://www.megaupload.com/?d=37BZJ6XB if doesnt work try google and search for it
Hamachi details
Main- Adminrscape pass- 123
when you connect u will see me on

item.title: Wanting players to join my server. Everyone is admin (ham)
item.dc:creator: @slowdown slowdown
item.description:
@slowdown wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:6, topic:234524”]Well, when they say they don’t want you to host a server. This is why, kids like you get hacked. :}

Most dumb kids like you, will say, It’s my ISP’s fault, they don’t have a good enough firewall. No, No my friend, It’s you. You, are an idiot, for hosting your server with Hamachi. Even a bigger idiot for trying to advertise it. Lol. Wow, i’ve never said this, cause I thought it is dumb, but this, this, is a true failure at work.[/quote]
So, i, see, you, like, to, use, comma’s, a lot, in, wrong, places.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:4, topic:234524”][quote author=james137137 link=topic=309233.msg2470914#msg2470914 date=1222987056]
I have no other option but to use hamachi as my country ISP doesnt allow customers to host server
[/quote]
Then I’ll be calling your ISP.
If your computer dies, its because someone hacked into it through Hamachi. Also, Hamachi anything means that is a piece of crap. Plus, your not allowed to advertise in any of the sections. Goto add your horrible server to the Hamachi list of crap. :)[/quote]
Lol.
